name: Global Talesrunner
description:
Videos :

A downloadable game for Windows Only

Global Talesrunner is a wonderfully bright and cheerful racing game that you can play with your friends!
Set in a world where your favorite fairy tales come to life. Challenge your friends and take some friendly competition to the next level.

  • 20+ Characters to choose from.
  • More than 100+ Maps to play in.
  • Make new friends & fish in the plaza.
  • 100% Free-To-Play.
